ðŸ“– Summary: The 4o-ghibli-at-home repository provides a self-hosted AI photo stylizer that transforms images into various artistic styles, including Ghibli-inspired anime. It features an advanced frontend with custom profile management and an efficient model pipeline for high-quality image generation on consumer GPUs, ensuring privacy by processing images locally without cloud involvement.
